All Classes

Class Description
AlreadyStartedException
The AlreadyStartedException is an exception that indicates that the game is already started when a ServerClientListenerThread tries to perform modification actions on the lobby.
Apollo
This is Apollo GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
Artemis
This is Artemis GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
Athena
This is Athena GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
Atlas
This is Atlas GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
BadRequestException
The BadRequestException is an exception used by the package controller which has the information that the request sent by the user can't be completed for different reasons, it is possible that is not well formed as well as it is possible that it is impossible with the current game state.
Build
This class represents a build of the workers in the game
Builder
This is the controller part dedicated to applying the builds
Building
This is the building class, which stores the information about the building on the map, for each cell
Cell
This is the Cell class, which implement a single cell on the map.
ChooseColorSceneController
This class implements the choosing color scene of the GUI.
ChooseGodsFirstSceneController
This class implements the choosing color scene of the GUI only for the challenger.
ChooseGodsSceneController
This class implements the choosing color scene of the GUI.
ChooseNumPlayerSceneController
This class implements the choosing number of players scene of the GUI.
ChooseStarterSceneController
This class implements the choosing starter player scene of the GUI.
ClientCLIApp
This class is the base App class for CLI clients, it starts the CLI client, the client lives until the player doesn't close the game.
ClientGUIApp
This class is the base App class for GUI clients, it starts the GUI client, the client lives until the player doesn't close the game.
ClientMessageListener
This class is the base network class of the client that is intended to communicate with the server, it is used by a CLI client or by a GUI client.
CliGame
This class interfaces with the user through the cli
CliInitial
This class is the class which creates and manages the lobby and the menu of the Santorini video game.
CliInitial.MenuPhase
This enum represent the phase of input taken by the cli from the player
CliInput
This class is a class used to get the input of the client with a interruptible style which permits to the application to be more responsive when a server message arrives and to reduce unwanted graphical bugs.
Color
This is a class which represent a rgb color.
Command
This class is the class used to get commands of the user with the CLI.
Constants
This is a class used to store programs constants.
DefeatManager
This is the controller part dedicated to checking the defeat of any player
Demeter
This is Demeter GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
FirstPlayerException
The FirstPlayerException is an exception that indicates an exceptional flow of the server threads, the player that joined a lobby is the first player and for this reason, he must choose the number of players for this lobby.
Game
This class is the main class for the model in the Distributed MVC pattern, this class is one of the few accessible classes of the core (the model) package, it expose some methods accessible from the outside classes which can be used to change the values of the game.
GamePhase
This enum represent the phase of the gaming phase.
GameState
This is a class for the GUI which holds all the information about the current game with the appropriate setters and getters.
GodCard
This is the GodCard class.
GodCardFactory
This class is a class which implements the Factory design pattern, it is a class which aim is to create GodCards types given some attributes without that the owner knows how it creates the cards.
GodsPhase
This enum represent the phase of a god phase, a god phase is the phase where the challenger chooses the gods for the game, players chooses the god and the challenger choose the starter.
GraphicInterface
This interface is the base class that represent the actions that must be performed by the GUI and CLI clients.
Hephaestus
This is Hephaestus GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
LoadingSceneController
This class implements the loading scenes of the GUI.
LobbySceneController
This class implements the lobby scene of the GUI.
MainCliController
This class is the base class for the Cli message management, it is the first client controller created and is necessary to receive messages from the server, it receives server messages and puts them into Cli queue and stops the input getter to get input setting a timeout on it.
mainGui  
MainGuiController
This is a class which implements the Singleton pattern and is the main controller class for the GUI version of the game, it is the class which interacts with the client network component and forwards the messages to the appropriate JavaFX controller.
Map
This is the map of the game
MapSceneController
This class implements the choosing color map of the GUI.
MenuSceneController
This class implements the menu scene of the GUI.
Minotaur
This is Minotaur GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
Move
This class represents a move of the workers in the game
Mover
This is the controller part dedicated to applying the moves
NetAvailableBuildings
This class is used to send to the user the positions where a specified worker can build.
NetAvailablePositions
This class is used to send to the user the positions where a specified worker can move.
NetBuild
This class is used by the player to communicate between server and clients the build that the clients want to perform or to communicate from the server to the clients the builds that can be effectuated by the active player of the current phase of the gaming game phase.
NetBuilding
This is an immutable class that represent a network object of a building of the game map.
NetCell
This class is the network class used to store the information of a game map cell.
NetColorPreparation
This class is a class used to exchange messages between clients and server in the color phase of the game when players have to choose a color.
NetDivinityChoice
This class is a class used to exchange messages between clients and server in the gods phase of the game where challenger chooses gods and the starter and players choose a god.
NetGameSetup
This class is a class used to exchange messages between clients and server in the game setup phase of the game where player positions worker on the game map.
NetGaming
This class is a class used to exchange messages between clients and server in the gaming phase of the game.
NetLobbyPreparation
This is a class used to exchange messages between clients and server when the players are inside a lobby.
NetMap
This is the network class that represent the server game map, it is a fully map with all the needed information using other network classes like NetCell directly and indirectly through the previous cited: NetWorker, NetBuilding.
NetMove
This class is used to communicate between clients and server the move that the clients want to perform and the possible moves that the active player in the current game phase can perform depending on its god power and workers positions.
NetObject
This class is the base class for every message exchange between a Santorini server and a Santorini client for the video game version, it implements java Serializable interface and is used to send a generic information, in fact it only carries the information about the message sent and the current version of the game.
NetSetup
This class is a network class used to exchange messages between clients and server before joining a lobby or during the preparation to join a lobby.
NetWorker
This class represent a worker on the game map, this worker is obviously owned by a player which is represented by a string that is its name, all clients has a list of all players inside the game and this makes possible to recognize a worker by the owner.
NetworkPhase
This class is the class which has the information about the network phase, these are similar to the game phase except of the OTHERTURN and OBSERVER phases because the first one is a normal gaming phase when the client can only disconnect and the observer when it can only disconnect and it has finished to play.
NicknameServerAddressSceneController
This class implements the nickname and ip address scene of the GUI.
NoBuildException
The NoBuildException is an exception which says that a certain god is god which power does not provide any build action for the specified game phase.
NoMoveException
The NoMoveException is an exception which says that a certain god is god which power does not provide any move action for the specified game phase.
ObservableGame
This class is the class that represent the Observer pattern used in Distributed MVC pattern used to create Santorini's video game, it is a class that represent a game that can be observer from ObserverRemoteView to gain information about the change of the game state using Observer pattern.
ObservableObject
This class represents a general observable object from an arbitrary number of observers of the type of ObserverObject.
ObservableRemoteView
This class represent the Observer for remote views inside the Distributed MVC pattern used to design Santorini video game, this class represent a remote view which communicate with a ObserverController to update the server about the choices done by the player during a match.
ObserverController
This class is the observer class for the controller class in the Distributed MVC that observes ObservableRemoteView.
ObserverObject
This interface is an interface that represent a general observer object for a Santorini video game.
ObserverRemoteView
This is the class that represent the Observer pattern for remote view inside the Distributed MVC pattern, this object will be overridden by the remote view of the server that implements the Distributed MVC remote view pattern.
Pair<P,​Q>
This is a class which represent a pair.
Pan
This is Pan GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
Phase
This enum has the information about the game phase of the match that is being played by Santorini's video gamers.
Player
This class stores the information about each player in the game
Prometheus
This is Prometheus GodCard, it has the specific implementation of the methods to calculate the moves and builds that each worker can do
RemoteView
This class is the remote view class of the Distributed MVC pattern, it receives input from client's view and forward these commands to the controller with light controls.
SceneController
This is the interface used by every scene of the GUI, this interface has two methods to handle errors and messages that arrives from the server.
Server
This class is the server class and it never ends, it manages the lobby creation and creation of threads which duty is to manage games, it creates ServerClientListenerThread class to communicate with clients and this class expose Thread safe method to modify the state of the lobby.
ServerApp
This class is the base App class for servers, it starts the server as a Thread, the server stand up for the whole execution.
ServerClientListenerThread
This class is the class for Server and Client communication, it receives client input using socket with classes of the package it.polimi.ingsw.network.objects and it.polimi.ingsw.network.game and is used to send input to the client.
ServerController
This is the main class for the controller of the game, it is the controller for the Distributed MVC pattern.
SetupManager
This class is the controller class which effectuate the actions needed in the game setup and requested from the clients.
Turn
This class represent the phase and the turn of the game, it has a phase and for some of them a subphase indicating how the game is going.
TypeBuild
This enumeration represents all the possible types of Build
TypeGod
This enumeration represents all the possible types of the heirs of GodCard and their behavior inside the game
TypeMove
This enumeration represents all the possible types of Move
UserInputController
This class is used by the Cli to send the input that the client insert to the server, it receives a command and translate it in a network message to pass to the ClientMessageListener to send to the server.
UserInputTimeoutException
The FirstPlayerException is an exception used by the CLI version of the game in getting input phase, this exception says that a message arrived from the server and the user hasn't wrote commands within a certain amount of time given to it.
VictoryManager
This is the controller part dedicated to checking the victory of any player
Worker
This is the Worker class, which stores the information about each worker of every Player.
WrongPhaseException
The WrongPhaseException is an exception thrown by model (classes inside it.polimi.ingsw.core package) methods to say that this specific method cannot be called in such game phase.
